Greetings from Trakbond! *{{1}}* 🌟

👋 We're thrilled to have you explore Trakbond, where we're dedicated to enhancing the safety and peace of mind for families, pet owners, and caregivers alike. Whether you're safeguarding *kids, special children, pets, or elderly loved ones*, we've got the perfect solution tailored for your needs.

 Our trackers come equipped with real-time location sharing, geo-fence alerts, and SOS emergency Alerts, ensuring the safety of your loved ones, whether they're at home, school, or on an adventure.

*🌟 Special Offer Just for You 🌟*

🚀 *Unbeatable Price Alert!*

*MRP: Rs 7999/-*
*Regular Price: 5499/-* (*31% Discount!*)

💥 *Now you will get it for Just Rs 4499/-* (*44% Discount!*) Offer valid for *Limited Time*

🎁 *Includes:*
- *3 Months FREE Subscription* worth Rs 447/-
- *Unlimited Data Plan with All India Coverage*

🛡️ *Plus:*
- *1 Year Warranty*
- *Lifetime Support*
- *10 days Money Back Guarantee* (*NO QUESTIONS ASKED*)
- *Quick Customer Support*

🇮🇳 *Proudly Made in India*

🛒 Buy Now & Save!

Choose your preferred shopping experience:

- From our official website: https://www.trakbond.com for the latest offers
- Or buy on *Amazon* for the same genuine products.

*Secure your peace of mind today with Trakbond, where safety meets convenience at an unbeatable price! 🌈*

*FAQs*

*1️⃣ What is the battery back-up of the Trakbond tracker?*

- The tracker offers *flexible battery life*: expect *8-12 hours* on active days and *up to 36 hours* when the device is less active (e.g., kept in a bag).

*2️⃣ Does the Trakbond tracker come with a SIM card?*

- Yes! Each tracker includes a *pre-installed SIM card* that works exclusively with our devices, offering *nationwide coverage in India*.
- Plus, you get a *3-month FREE subscription* to start!

*3️⃣ How big and heavy is the Trakbond tracker?*

- Our tracker is designed to be *compact and lightweight* for everyday comfort and ease of use.
- It weighs just *40 grams* and measures *4cm x 4cm*.

*4️⃣ What are the attachment options available for the Trakbond tracker?*

- The tracker is equipped with *multiple attachment options* to suit your needs.
- It comes with a *carabiner*, an *extensible loop thread*, and a *protective silicone case with a belt loop*, making it easy to wear in various ways (*clipped, hung, or slipped into a pocket*).

More details: https://www.trakbond.com/faq
